dimensions:
without mount: 25 3/4 x 13 1/4 in. (65.4 x 33.7 cm)
with mount: 81 3/4 x 19 3/4 in. (207.6 x 50.2 cm)
title: Scholar's Villa in Mountain Mist
medium: hanging scroll, ink and colors on paper
inscriptions: Dated gui si year (1953), spring, signed, "Binhong aged ninety," and with two seals of the artist.
